original: Majjhima Nikāya 112
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Chabbisodhanasutta
analyzed: chabbisodhana sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu aññaṁ byākaroti:
analyzed: idha bhikkhave bhikkhu aññam byākaroti

original: ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti pajānāmī’ti.
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāmi iti

original: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno bhāsitaṁ neva abhinanditabbaṁ nappaṭikkositabbaṁ.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave bhikkhuno bhāsitam na iva abhinanditabbam na paṭikkositabba

original: Anabhinanditvā appaṭikkositvā pañho pucchitabbo:
analyzed: an abhinanditvā a paṭikkositvā pañhaḥ pucchitabbo

original: ‘cattārome, āvuso, vohārā tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammadakkhātā.
analyzed: cattāro me āvuso vohārā tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammad akkhātā

original: Katame cattāro?
analyzed: katame cattāro

original: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhavāditā, sute sutavāditā, mute mutavāditā, viññāte viññātavāditā—
analyzed: diṭṭhe diṭṭhavāditā sute suta vāditā mute muta vāditā viññāte viññāta vāditā

original: ime kho, āvuso, cattāro vohārā tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammadakkhātā.
analyzed: ime kho āvuso cattāro vohārā tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammad akkhātā

original: Kathaṁ jānato panāyasmato, kathaṁ passato imesu catūsu vohāresu anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan’ti?
analyzed: katham jānataḥ pana āyasmataḥ katham passataḥ imesu catūsu vohāresu an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimuttanti

original: Khīṇāsavassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vusitavato katakaraṇīyassa ohitabhārassa anuppattasadatthassa parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanassa sammadaññāvimuttassa ayamanudhammo hoti veyyākaraṇāya:
analyzed: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ vusitavataḥ kata karaṇīyassa ohita bhārassa an uppatta sadatthassa parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanassa sammad aññā vimuttassa ayam anudhammaḥ hoti veyyākaraṇāya

original: ‘diṭṭhe kho ahaṁ, āvuso, anupāyo anapāyo anissito appaṭibaddho vippamutto visaṁyutto vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharāmi.
analyzed: diṭṭhe kho aha āvuso anupāyaḥ anapāyaḥ anissitaḥ appaṭibaddhaḥ vippamuttaḥ visayuttaḥ vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharāmi

original: Sute kho ahaṁ, āvuso …pe…
analyzed: sute khalu aha āvuso pe

original: mute kho ahaṁ, āvuso …
analyzed: mute khalu aha āvuso

original: viññāte kho ahaṁ, āvuso, anupāyo anapāyo anissito appaṭibaddho vippamutto visaṁyutto vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharāmi.
analyzed: viññāte kho aha āvuso anupāyaḥ anapāyaḥ anissitaḥ appaṭibaddhaḥ vippamuttaḥ visayuttaḥ vimariyādīkatena cetasā viharāmi

original: Evaṁ kho me, āvuso, jānato evaṁ passato imesu catūsu vohāresu anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan’ti.
analyzed: evam kho me āvuso jānataḥ evam passataḥ imesu catūsu vohāresu an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimuttanti

original: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘sādhū’ti bhāsitaṁ abhinanditabbaṁ anumoditabbaṁ.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave bhikkhuno sādhu uti bhāsitam abhinanditabbam anumoditabba

original: ‘Sādhū’ti bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uttariṁ pañho pucchitabbo.
analyzed: sādhu iti bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uttarim pañhaḥ pucchitabbo

original: ‘Pañcime, āvuso, upādānakkhandhā tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammadakkhātā.
analyzed: pañcime āvuso upādānakkhandhā tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammad akkhātā

original: Katame pañca?
analyzed: katame pañca

original: Seyyathidaṁ—rūpupādānakkhandho, vedanupādānakkhandho, saññupādānakkhandho, saṅkhārupādānakkhandho, viññāṇupādānakkhandho—
analyzed: seyyathidaṃ rūpa upādānakkhandhaḥ vedanupādānakkhandhaḥ saññu pādānakkhandhaḥ saṅkhāru pādānakkhandhaḥ viññāṇupādānakkhandhaḥ

original: ime kho, āvuso, pañcupādānakkhandhā tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammadakkhātā.
analyzed: ime kho āvuso pañca upādāna khandhā tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammad akkhātā

original: Kathaṁ jānato panāyasmato, kathaṁ passato imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan’ti?
analyzed: katham jānataḥ pana āyasmataḥ katham passataḥ imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimuttanti

original: Khīṇāsavassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vusitavato katakaraṇīyassa ohitabhārassa anuppattasadatthassa parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanassa sammadaññāvimuttassa ayamanudhammo hoti veyyākaraṇāya:
analyzed: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ vusitavataḥ kata karaṇīyassa ohita bhārassa an uppatta sadatthassa parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanassa sammad aññā vimuttassa ayam anudhammaḥ hoti veyyākaraṇāya

original: ‘rūpaṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso, abalaṁ virāgunaṁ anassāsikanti viditvā ye rūpe upāyūpādānā
analyzed: rūpam kho aha āvuso abalam virāgunam anassāsikanti viditvā ye rūpe upāyu upādānā

original: cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā tesaṁ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimuttaṁ
analyzed: cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā tesam khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimutta

original: me cittanti pajānāmi.
analyzed: me cittanti pajānāmi

original: Vedanaṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso …pe…
analyzed: vedanam khalu aha āvuso pe

original: saññaṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso …
analyzed: saññam kho aha āvuso

original: saṅkhāre kho ahaṁ, āvuso …
analyzed: saṅkhāre khalu aha āvuso

original: viññāṇaṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso, abalaṁ virāgunaṁ anassāsikanti viditvā ye viññāṇe upāyūpādānā
analyzed: viññāṇam kho aha āvuso abalam virāgunam anassāsikam ti viditvā ye viññāṇe upāyu upādānā

original: cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā tesaṁ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimuttaṁ
analyzed: cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā tesam khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimutta

original: me cittanti pajānāmi.
analyzed: me cittanti pajānāmi

original: Evaṁ kho me, āvuso, jānato evaṁ passato imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan’ti.
analyzed: evam kho me āvuso jānataḥ evam passataḥ imesu pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimuttanti

original: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘sādhū’ti bhāsitaṁ abhinanditabbaṁ, anumoditabbaṁ.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave bhikkhuno sādhu uti bhāsitam abhinanditabba anumoditabba

original: ‘Sādhū’ti bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uttariṁ pañho pucchitabbo.
analyzed: sādhu iti bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uttarim pañhaḥ pucchitabbo

original: ‘Chayimā, āvuso, dhātuyo tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammadakkhātā.
analyzed: chayimāḥ āvuso dhātuyaḥ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammad akkhātā

original: Katamā cha?
analyzed: katamā cha

original: Pathavīdhātu, āpodhātu, tejodhātu, vāyodhātu, ākāsadhātu, viññāṇadhātu—
analyzed: pathavī dhātu āpaḥ dhātu tejaḥ dhātu vāyo dhātu ākāsa dhātu viññāṇa dhātu

original: imā kho, āvuso, cha dhātuyo tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammadakkhātā.
analyzed: imāḥ kho āvuso cha dhātuyaḥ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammad akkhātā

original: Kathaṁ jānato panāyasmato, kathaṁ passato imāsu chasu dhātūsu anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan’ti?
analyzed: katham jānataḥ pana āyasmataḥ katham passataḥ imāsu chasu dhātūsu an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimuttanti

original: Khīṇāsavassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vusitavato katakaraṇīyassa ohitabhārassa anuppattasadatthassa parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanassa sammadaññāvimuttassa ayamanudhammo hoti veyyākaraṇāya:
analyzed: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ vusitavataḥ kata karaṇīyassa ohita bhārassa an uppatta sadatthassa parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanassa sammad aññā vimuttassa ayam anudhammaḥ hoti veyyākaraṇāya

original: ‘pathavīdhātuṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso, na attato upagacchiṁ, na ca pathavīdhātunissitaṁ attānaṁ.
analyzed: pathavī dhātum kho aha āvuso na attataḥ upagacchi na ca pathavī dhātu nissitam

original: Ye ca pathavīdhātunissitā upāyūpādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā tesaṁ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimuttaṁ me cittanti pajānāmi.
analyzed: ye ca pathavī dhātu nissitāḥ upāyu upādānā cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā tesam khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimuttam me cittam ti pajānāmi

original: Āpodhātuṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso …pe…
analyzed: āpodhātum khalu aha āvuso pe

original: tejodhātuṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso …
analyzed: tejaḥ dhātum khalu aha āvuso

original: vāyodhātuṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso …
analyzed: vāyodhātum khalu aha āvuso

original: ākāsadhātuṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso …
analyzed: ākāsadhātum khalu aha āvuso

original: viññāṇadhātuṁ kho ahaṁ, āvuso, na attato upagacchiṁ, na ca viññāṇadhātunissitaṁ attānaṁ.
analyzed: viññāṇa dhātum kho aha āvuso na attataḥ upagacchi na ca viññāṇa dhātu nissitam attāna

original: Ye ca viññāṇadhātunissitā upāyūpādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā tesaṁ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimuttaṁ me cittanti pajānāmi.
analyzed: ye ca viññāṇa dhātu nissitāḥ upāyu upādānā cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā tesam khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimuttam me cittam ti pajānāmi

original: Evaṁ kho me, āvuso, jānato, evaṁ passato imāsu chasu dhātūsu anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan’ti.
analyzed: evam kho me āvuso jānataḥ evam passataḥ imāsu chasu dhātūsu an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimuttanti

original: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘sādhū’ti bhāsitaṁ abhinanditabbaṁ, anumoditabbaṁ.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave bhikkhuno sādhu uti bhāsitam abhinanditabba anumoditabba

original: ‘Sādhū’ti bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uttariṁ pañho pucchitabbo.
analyzed: sādhu iti bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uttarim pañhaḥ pucchitabbo

original: ‘Cha kho panimāni, āvuso, ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammadakkhātāni.
analyzed: cha kho panimāni āvuso ajjhattika bāhirāni āyatanāni tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammad akkhātāni

original: Katamāni cha?
analyzed: katamāni cha

original: Cakkhu ceva rūpā ca, sotañca saddā ca, ghānañca gandhā ca, jivhā ca rasā ca, kāyo ca phoṭṭhabbā ca, mano ca dhammā ca—
analyzed: cakkhu ca iva rūpā ca sotañca saddā ca ghānañca gandhā ca jivhā ca rasā ca kāyo ca phoṭṭhabbā ca mano ca dhammā ca

original: imāni kho, āvuso, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammadakkhātāni.
analyzed: imāni kho āvuso cha ajjhattika bāhirāni āyatanāni tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sammad akkhātāni

original: Kathaṁ jānato panāyasmato, kathaṁ passato imesu chasu ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesu anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan’ti?
analyzed: katham jānato pana āyasmataḥ katham passato imesu chasu ajjhattika bāhiresu āyatanesu an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimuttanti

original: Khīṇāsavassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vusitavato katakaraṇīyassa ohitabhārassa anuppattasadatthassa parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanassa sammadaññāvimuttassa ayamanudhammo hoti veyyākaraṇāya:
analyzed: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ vusitavataḥ kata karaṇīyassa ohita bhārassa an uppatta sadatthassa parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanassa sammad aññā vimuttassa ayam anudhammaḥ hoti veyyākaraṇāya

original: ‘cakkhusmiṁ, āvuso, rūpe cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu yo chando
analyzed: cakkhusmi āvuso rūpe cakkhu viññāṇe cakkhu viññāṇa viññātabbesu dhammesu yaḥ chandaḥ

original: yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye ca upāyūpādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā tesaṁ
analyzed: yaḥ rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā ye ca upāyu upādānā cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā tesa

original: khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimuttaṁ me cittanti pajānāmi.
analyzed: khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimuttam me cittam ti pajānāmi

original: Sotasmiṁ, āvuso, sadde sotaviññāṇe …pe…
analyzed: sotasmi āvuso sadde sota viññāṇe pe

original: ghānasmiṁ, āvuso, gandhe ghānaviññāṇe …
analyzed: ghānasmi āvuso gandhe ghāna viññāṇe

original: jivhāya, āvuso, rase jivhāviññāṇe …
analyzed: jivhāyaḥ āvuso rase jivhā viññāṇe

original: kāyasmiṁ, āvuso, phoṭṭhabbe kāyaviññāṇe …
analyzed: kāyasmi āvuso phoṭṭhabbe kāya viññāṇe

original: manasmiṁ, āvuso, dhamme manoviññāṇe manoviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesu yo chando yo
analyzed: manasmi āvuso dhamme manaḥ viññāṇe manaḥ viññāṇa viññātabbesu dhammesu yaḥ chandaḥ yaḥ

original: rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā ye ca upāyūpādānā cetaso adhiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayā tesaṁ khayā
analyzed: rāgaḥ yā nandī yā taṇhā ye ca upāyu upādānā cetasaḥ adhiṭṭhāna abhinivesa anusayā tesam khayā

original: virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimuttaṁ me cittanti pajānāmi.
analyzed: virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā vimuttam me cittam ti pajānāmi

original: Evaṁ kho me, āvuso, jānato evaṁ passato imesu chasu ajjhattikabāhiresu āyatanesu anupādāya āsavehi cittaṁ vimuttan’ti.
analyzed: evam kho me āvuso jānataḥ evam passataḥ imesu chasu ajjhattika bāhiresu āyatanesu an upādāya āsavehi cittam vimuttanti

original: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘sādhū’ti bhāsitaṁ abhinanditabbaṁ anumoditabbaṁ.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave bhikkhuno sādhu uti bhāsitam abhinanditabbam anumoditabba

original: ‘Sādhū’ti bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uttariṁ pañho pucchitabbo.
analyzed: sādhu iti bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā uttarim pañhaḥ pucchitabbo

original: ‘Kathaṁ jānato panāyasmato, kathaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā samūhatā’ti?
analyzed: katham jānato pana āyasmato katham passato imasmin ca sa viññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabba nimittesu ahaṅkāra mamaṅkāra māna anusayā

original: Khīṇāsavassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno vusitavato katakaraṇīyassa ohitabhārassa anuppattasadatthassa parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojanassa sammadaññāvimuttassa ayamanudhammo hoti veyyākaraṇāya:
analyzed: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhave bhikkhunaḥ vusitavataḥ kata karaṇīyassa ohita bhārassa an uppatta sadatthassa parikkhīṇa bhava sayojanassa sammad aññā vimuttassa ayam anudhammaḥ hoti veyyākaraṇāya

original: ‘pubbe kho ahaṁ, āvuso, agāriyabhūto samāno aviddasu ahosiṁ.
analyzed: pubbe kho aha āvuso agāriya bhūtaḥ samānaḥ aviddasu ahosi

original: Tassa me tathāgato vā tathāgatasāvako vā dhammaṁ desesi.
analyzed: tassa me tathāgataḥ vā tathāgata sāvakaḥ vā dhammam desesi

original: Tāhaṁ dhammaṁ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṁ paṭilabhiṁ.
analyzed: tāham dhammam sutvā tathāgate saddham paṭilabhi

original: So tena saddhāpaṭilābhena samannāgato iti paṭisañcikkhiṁ:
analyzed: saḥ tena saddhā paṭilābhena samannāgataḥ iti paṭisañcikkhi

original: “sambādho gharāvāso rajāpatho, abbhokāso pabbajjā.
analyzed: sambādhaḥ gharāvāsaḥ rajāpathaḥ abbhokāsaḥ pabbajjā

original: Nayidaṁ sukaraṁ agāraṁ ajjhāvasatā ekantaparipuṇṇaṁ ekantaparisuddhaṁ saṅkhalikhitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carituṁ.
analyzed: na idam sukaram agāram ajjhāvasatā ekanta paripuṇṇam ekanta parisuddham saṅkha likhitam brahmacariyam caritu

original: Yannūnāhaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajeyyan”ti.
analyzed: yat nūna aham kesa massuṃ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni a chādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbajeyyanti

original: So kho ahaṁ, āvuso, aparena samayena appaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ pahāya mahantaṁ vā bhogakkhandhaṁ
analyzed: saḥ kho aha āvuso aparena samayena appam vā bhogakkhandham pahāya mahantam vā bhogakkhandha

original: pahāya, appaṁ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṁ pahāya mahantaṁ vā ñātiparivaṭṭaṁ pahāya kesamassuṁ
analyzed: pahāya appam vā ñāti parivaṭṭam pahāya mahantam vā ñāti parivaṭṭam pahāya kesa massu

original: ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajiṁ.
analyzed: ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni a chādetvā agārasma anagāriyam pabbaji

original: So evaṁ pabbajito samāno bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno pāṇātipātaṁ pahāya pāṇātipātā
analyzed: so evam pabbajitaḥ samānaḥ bhikkhūnam sikkhā sājīva samāpannaḥ pāṇātipātam pahāya pāṇātipātā

original: paṭivirato ahosiṁ nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho, lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī vihāsiṁ.
analyzed: paṭivirataḥ ahosim nihita daṇḍaḥ nihita satthaḥ lajjī dayā āpanno sabba pāṇa bhūta hita anukampī vihāsi

original: Adinnādānaṁ pahāya adinnādānā paṭivirato ahosiṁ dinnādāyī dinnapāṭikaṅkhī, athenena sucibhūtena attanā vihāsiṁ.
analyzed: a dinna ādānam pahāya a dinna ādānā paṭivirataḥ ahosim dinna ādāyī dinna pāṭikaṅkhī athenena sucibhūtena attanā vihāsi

original: Abrahmacariyaṁ pahāya brahmacārī ahosiṁ ārācārī virato methunā gāmadhammā.
analyzed: a brahmacariyam pahāya brahmacārī ahosim ārā cārī virataḥ methunā

original: Musāvādaṁ pahāya musāvādā paṭivirato ahosiṁ saccavādī saccasandho theto paccayiko avisaṁvādako lokassa.
analyzed: musāvādam pahāya musāvādā paṭivirataḥ ahosim sacca vādī sacca sandho theto paccayikaḥ a visavādakaḥ lokassa

original: Pisuṇaṁ vācaṁ pahāya pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirato ahosiṁ, ito sutvā na amutra akkhātā
analyzed: pisuṇam vācam pahāya pisuṇāya vācāya paṭivirataḥ ahosi itas sutvā na amutra

original: imesaṁ bhedāya, amutra vā sutvā na imesaṁ akkhātā amūsaṁ bhedāya; iti bhinnānaṁ vā
analyzed: imesam bhedāya amutra vā sutvā na imesam akkhātāḥ amūsam bhedāya iti bhinnānam vā

original: sandhātā sahitānaṁ vā anuppadātā samaggārāmo samaggarato samagganandī samaggakaraṇiṁ
analyzed: sandhātā sahitānam vā anuppadātā samagga ārāmaḥ samagga rataḥ samagga nandī samagga karaṇi

original: vācaṁ bhāsitā ahosiṁ.
analyzed: vācam bhāsitā ahosi

original: Pharusaṁ vācaṁ pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirato ahosiṁ; yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇasukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahujanakantā bahujanamanāpā tathārūpiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā ahosiṁ.
analyzed: pharusam vācam pahāya pharusāya vācāya paṭivirataḥ ahosi yā sā vācā nelā kaṇṇa sukhā pemanīyā hadayaṅgamā porī bahu jana kantā bahu jana manāpā tathārūpim vācam bhāsitā ahosi

original: Samphappalāpaṁ pahāya samphappalāpā paṭivirato ahosiṁ; kālavādī bhūtavādī atthavādī
analyzed: samphappalāpam pahāya samphappalāpā paṭivirataḥ ahosi kāla vādī bhūta vādī attha vādī

original: dhammavādī vinayavādī nidhānavatiṁ vācaṁ bhāsitā ahosiṁ kālena sāpadesaṁ pariyantavatiṁ atthasaṁhitaṁ.
analyzed: dhamma vādī vinaya vādī nidhānavatim vācam bhāsitā ahosim kālena sa apadesam pariyantavatim attha sahita

original: So bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā paṭivirato ahosiṁ, ekabhattiko ahosiṁ rattūparato virato vikālabhojanā.
analyzed: saḥ bīja gāma bhūta gāma samārambhā paṭivirataḥ ahosi ekabhattikaḥ ahosim rattu uparataḥ virataḥ vikāla bhojanā

original: Naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato ahosiṁ.
analyzed: nacca gīta vādita visūka dassanā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: Mālāgandhavilepanadhāraṇamaṇḍanavibhūsanaṭṭhānā paṭivirato ahosiṁ.
analyzed: mālā gandha vilepana dhāraṇa maṇḍana vibhūsana ṭṭhānā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: Uccāsayanamahāsayanā paṭivirato ahosiṁ.
analyzed: uccāsayana mahāsayanā paṭivirataḥ

original: Jātarūparajatapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato ahosiṁ,
analyzed: jātarūpa rajata paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato ahosiṁ,
analyzed: āmaka dhañña paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato ahosi

original: āmakamaṁsapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato ahosiṁ;
analyzed: paṭivirato ahosi

original: itthikumārikapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato ahosiṁ,
analyzed: itthi kumārika paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: dāsidāsapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato ahosiṁ,
analyzed: dāsi dāsa paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: ajeḷakapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato ahosiṁ,
analyzed: ajeḷaka paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: kukkuṭasūkarapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato ahosiṁ,
analyzed: kukkuṭa sūkara paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: hatthigavassavaḷavapaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato ahosiṁ,
analyzed: hatthi ga vassa vaḷava paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: khettavatthupaṭiggahaṇā paṭivirato ahosiṁ.
analyzed: khetta vatthu paṭiggahaṇā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: Dūteyyapahiṇagamanānuyogā paṭivirato ahosiṁ,
analyzed: paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: kayavikkayā paṭivirato ahosiṁ,
analyzed: kaya vikkayā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: tulākūṭakaṁsakūṭamānakūṭā paṭivirato ahosiṁ,
analyzed: tulākūṭaka sakūṭa māna kūṭā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: ukkoṭanavañcananikatisāciyogā paṭivirato ahosiṁ,
analyzed: ukkoṭana vañcana nikati sāci yogā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: chedanavadhabandhanaviparāmosaālopasahasākārā paṭivirato ahosiṁ.
analyzed: chedana vadha bandhana viparāmosa ālopa sahasā ākārā paṭivirataḥ ahosi

original: So santuṭṭho ahosiṁ kāyaparihārikena cīvarena, kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena. So yena yeneva pakkamiṁ samādāyeva pakkamiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ santuṭṭhaḥ ahosim kāya parihārikena cīvarena kucchi parihārikena piṇḍapātena saḥ yena yena iva pakkamim samādāya iva pakkami

original: Seyyathāpi nāma pakkhī sakuṇo yena yeneva ḍeti sapattabhārova ḍeti;
analyzed: seyyathā api nāma pakkhī sakuṇaḥ yena yena iva ḍeti sa patta bhāraḥ uva ḍeti

original: evameva kho ahaṁ, āvuso; santuṭṭho ahosiṁ kāyaparihārikena cīvarena, kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena. So yena yeneva pakkamiṁ samādāyeva pakkamiṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho aha āvuso santuṭṭhaḥ ahosim kāya parihārikena cīvarena kucchi parihārikena piṇḍapātena saḥ yena yena iva pakkamim samādāya iva pakkami

original: So iminā ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato ajjhattaṁ anavajjasukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedesiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ iminā ariyena sīla kkhandhena samannāgataḥ ajjhattam anavajja sukham paṭisavedesi

original: So cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā na nimittaggāhī ahosiṁ nānubyañjanaggāhī;
analyzed: so cakkhunā rūpam disvā na nimitta ggāhī ahosim na anubyañjana ggāhī

original: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ cakkhundriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
analyzed: yatvā adhikaraṇam enam cakkhu indriyam asavutam viharantam abhijjhā domanassā pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ

original: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ, tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjiṁ; rakkhiṁ cakkhundriyaṁ, cakkhundriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjiṁ.
analyzed: dhammāḥ anvāssaveyyu tassa savarāya paṭipajji rakkhim cakkhu indriya cakkhu indriye savaram āpajji

original: Sotena saddaṁ sutvā …pe…
analyzed: sotena saddam sutvā pe

original: ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyitvā …pe…
analyzed: ghānena gandham ghāyitvā pe

original: jivhāya rasaṁ sāyitvā …pe…
analyzed: jivhāya rasam sāyitvā pe

original: kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusitvā …pe…
analyzed: kāyena phoṭṭhabbam phusitvā pe

original: manasā dhammaṁ viññāya na nimittaggāhī ahosiṁ nānubyañjanaggāhī;
analyzed: manasā dhammam viññāya na nimitta ggāhī ahosim na anubyañjana ggāhī

original: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ manindriyaṁ asaṁvutaṁ viharantaṁ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
analyzed: yatvā adhikaraṇam enam man indriyam viharantam abhijjhā domanassā pāpakāḥ akusalāḥ

original: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṁ, tassa saṁvarāya paṭipajjiṁ; rakkhiṁ manindriyaṁ, manindriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjiṁ.
analyzed: dhammāḥ anvāssaveyyu tassa savarāya paṭipajji rakkhim manindriya manindriye savaram āpajji

original: So iminā ariyena indriyasaṁvarena samannāgato ajjhattaṁ abyāsekasukhaṁ paṭisaṁvedesiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ iminā ariyena indriya savarena samannāgataḥ ajjhattam a byāseka sukham paṭisavedesi

original: So abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī ahosiṁ, ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī ahosiṁ,
analyzed: saḥ abhikkante paṭikkante sampajānakārī ahosi ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī ahosi

original: samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī ahosiṁ, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe sampajānakārī
analyzed: samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī ahosi saṅghāṭi patta cīvara dhāraṇe sampajānakārī

original: ahosiṁ, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī ahosiṁ, uccārapassāvakamme sampajānakārī
analyzed: ahosi asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajāna kārī ahosi uccāra passāva kamme sampajāna kārī

original: ahosiṁ, gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī ahosiṁ.
analyzed: ahosi gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajāna kārī ahosi

original: So iminā ca ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato, imāya ca ariyāya santuṭṭhiyā samannāgato,
analyzed: so iminā ca ariyena sīla kkhandhena samannāgataḥ imāya ca ariyāya santuṭṭhiyā samannāgataḥ

original: iminā ca ariyena indriyasaṁvarena samannāgato, iminā ca ariyena satisampajaññena samannāgato
analyzed: iminā ca ariyena indriya savarena samannāgataḥ iminā ca ariyena sati sampajaññena samannāgataḥ

original: vivittaṁ senāsanaṁ bhajiṁ araññaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pabbataṁ kandaraṁ giriguhaṁ susānaṁ vanapatthaṁ abbhokāsaṁ palālapuñjaṁ.
analyzed: vivittam senāsanam bhajim araññam rukkha mūlam pabbatam kandaram giri guham su sānam vana pattham abbhokāsam palāla puñja

original: So pacchābhattaṁ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto nisīdiṁ pallaṅkaṁ ābhujitvā ujuṁ kāyaṁ paṇidhāya parimukhaṁ satiṁ upaṭṭhapetvā.
analyzed: saḥ pacchābhattam piṇḍapāta paṭikkantaḥ nisīdim pallaṅkam ābhujitvā ujum kāyam paṇidhāya parimukham satim upaṭṭhapetvā

original: So abhijjhaṁ loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā vihāsiṁ, abhijjhāya cittaṁ parisodhesiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ abhijjham loke pahāya vigata abhijjhena cetasā vihāsi abhijjhāya cittam parisodhesi

original: Byāpādapadosaṁ pahāya abyāpannacitto vihāsiṁ sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī, byāpādapadosā cittaṁ parisodhesiṁ.
analyzed: byāpāda padosam pahāya a byāpanna cittaḥ vihāsim sabba pāṇa bhūta hita anukampī byāpāda padosā cittam parisodhesi

original: Thinamiddhaṁ pahāya vigatathinamiddho vihāsiṁ ālokasaññī sato sampajāno, thinamiddhā cittaṁ parisodhesiṁ.
analyzed: thinamiddham pahāya vigata thinamiddhaḥ vihāsim āloka saññī sataḥ sampajānaḥ thinamiddhā cittam parisodhesi

original: Uddhaccakukkuccaṁ pahāya anuddhato vihāsiṁ ajjhattaṁ, vūpasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccā cittaṁ parisodhesiṁ.
analyzed: uddhacca kukkuccam pahāya anuddhataḥ vihāsim ajjhatta vūpasanta cittaḥ uddhacca kukkuccā cittam parisodhesi

original: Vicikicchaṁ pahāya tiṇṇavicikiccho vihāsiṁ akathaṅkathī kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchāya cittaṁ parisodhesiṁ.
analyzed: vicikiccham pahāya tiṇṇa vicikicchaḥ vihāsim a kathaṅkathī kusalesu dhammesu vicikicchāya cittam parisodhesi

original: So ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetaso upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe
analyzed: saḥ ime pañca nīvaraṇe pahāya cetasaḥ upakkilese paññāya dubbalīkaraṇe

original: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
analyzed: vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja vihāsi

original: Vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: vitakka vicārānam vūpasamāḥ ajjhattam sampasādanam cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvam a vitakkam a vicāram samādhi jam pīti sukham dutiyam jhānam

original: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …
analyzed: tatiyam jhānam

original: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
analyzed: catuttham jhānam upasampajja vihāsi

original: So evaṁ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṁ khayañāṇāya cittaṁ abhininnāmesiṁ.
analyzed: saḥ evam samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigata upakkilese mudu bhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñja ppatte āsavānam khaya ñāṇāya cittam abhininnāmesi

original: So idaṁ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, ayaṁ dukkhasamudayoti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ,
analyzed: so idam dukkhanti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi ayam dukkha samudayo ti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi

original: ayaṁ dukkhanirodhoti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti
analyzed: ayam dukkha nirodho ti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ti

original: yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ;
analyzed: yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi

original: ime āsavāti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, ayaṁ āsavasamudayoti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ,
analyzed: ime āsavā ti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi ayam āsava samudayaḥ iti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi

original: ayaṁ āsavanirodhoti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ, ayaṁ āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yathābhūtaṁ abbhaññāsiṁ.
analyzed: ayam āsava nirodhaḥ iti yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi ayam āsava nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati yathābhūtam abbhaññāsi

original: Tassa me evaṁ jānato evaṁ passato kāmāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccittha, bhavāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccittha, avijjāsavāpi cittaṁ vimuccittha.
analyzed: tassa me evam jānataḥ evam passataḥ kāma āsavā api cittam vimuccittha bhava āsavā api cittam vimuccittha avijjā āsavā api cittam vimuccittha

original: Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ ahosi.
analyzed: vimuttasmin vimuttam iti ñāṇam ahosi

original: Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyāti abbhaññāsiṁ.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati

original: Evaṁ kho me, āvuso, jānato evaṁ passato imasmiñca saviññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabbanimittesu ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayā samūhatā’ti.
analyzed: evam kho me āvuso jānataḥ evam passataḥ imasmin ca sa viññāṇake kāye bahiddhā ca sabba nimittesu ahaṅkāra mamaṅkāra māna anusayā samūhatā ati

original: Tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno ‘sādhū’ti bhāsitaṁ abhinanditabbaṁ anumoditabbaṁ.
analyzed: tassa bhikkhave bhikkhuno sādhu uti bhāsitam abhinanditabbam anumoditabba

original: ‘Sādhū’ti bhāsitaṁ abhinanditvā anumoditvā evamassa vacanīyo:
analyzed: sādhu iti bhāsitam abhinanditvā anumoditvā evam assa vacanīyaḥ

original: ‘lābhā no, āvuso, suladdhaṁ no, āvuso,
analyzed: lābhāḥ naḥ āvuso su laddham naḥ āvuso

original: ye mayaṁ āyasmantaṁ tādisaṁ sabrahmacāriṁ samanupassāmā’”ti.
analyzed: ye mayam āyasmantam tādisam sabrahmacārim samanupassāma ati

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Chabbisodhanasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ dutiyaṁ.
analyzed: chabbisodhana suttam niṭṭhitam dutiya
